content.raw:
These helper functions look nice. I'm testing them out right now.

I would argue that all tests should use unique paths to prevent permissions problems (for example the ones that currently use `/tmp/gazebo_test`). To enable this we could make `SystemPaths::GetDefaultTestPath()` return a path relative to `tmpInstancePath`. I'll suggest a patch after I've tested it.
